transcript.text: All of us, regardless of our roles, are responsible for protecting the personal information of customers, employees and business partners. In this module, you'll learn how to do it.

panelText.text: We are all responsible for protecting the personal data of customers, employees and business partners.
Information that allows someone to be identified must be carefully guarded.
Be extra careful when posting online or working in public places.
